full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 753 Filed 08/10/22 Page 138 of 264 1564
LC7Cmax4 Carolyn - cross
1 A. We didn't drink any alcohol.
2 Q. Did other drugs?
3 A. No.
4 Q. Now, as I understand it, you were at a party when Virginia Roberts approached you first about making $300; is that correct?
5
6 A. Absolutely not.
7 Q. Do you remember speaking to the FBI in 2007?
8 A. Yes.
9 Q. And that was the first time that you talked to any law enforcement about Mr. Epstein; correct?
10 A. Yes.
11 Q. And I'll direct --
12 MR. PAGLIUCA: May I approach the witness, your Honor?
13 THE COURT: You may.
14 Q. If you could turn to tab 5 in that binder that I just handed you, the big one, which is 3505-005, page 1.
15 A. Sorry. In which binder?
16 Q. The big binder that I just gave you.
17 THE COURT: Ms. Comey, do you have it?
18 MS. COMEY: I do. Thank you, your Honor.
19 A. What number? I'm sorry.
20 Q. It's the first tab, it's got a 5 on it.
21 A. It's upside down. Hold on.
22 Q. The first page.
23 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00013151
